page.title: 13 EDUCATION
page.content: As there are over 10,000 people in North Hykeham there are Nursery and play schools.They are all optional and private and you have to pay,although in other places you don't have to. There are 3 primary schools in North Hykeham.There used to be 4 schools but one of them has now closed.To start primary school you have to be 5 although some other schools can start at rising 5.Our school is a state school which means that you don't have to pay.The age group is 5_11 years. There are 2 secondary schools and they both have at least 1200 pupils.The ages are 11_16 and then you have an option to stay to 18 or to leave school. There are no Collages or any universities in North Hykeham although there are some Adult Education classes
